rooms.name: Entrance and Living Area
rooms.description: Spacious entrance hall leading to an open living-dining space. The layout ensures a seamless flow, following Vastu principles by keeping the main entry aligned with the north-east direction. Designed for wheelchair accessibility with wide doorways and ramps.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Primary bedroom offering privacy with attached bathroom. The room is designed according to Vastu principles by placing the bed in the south-west corner to promote restful sleep, ensuring wheelchair-accessible layout.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Secondary bedroom that can double as a study space. Designed with ample space for mobility devices and includes built-in storage.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet, well-lit space dedicated to reading and relaxation. Incorporates large windows on the south-east side in accordance with Vastu guidelines to ensure natural light.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed for a family of four, featuring wheelchair-accessible counters and appliances aligned according to Vastu principles, ensuring efficient movement.

rooms.name: Utility Room/Bathroom
rooms.description: Additional bathroom space adjacent to the living area. Designed with accessibility in mind with grab bars and a step-free shower.

openings.description: Wheelchair-accessible main entrance designed on the north-east side following Vastu. Includes ramp and threshold elimination.
Dedicated garage entrance for a two-car garage located at the south-west corner ensuring privacy while still being accessible.
Large patio door leading to an outdoor space designed with Vastu principles in mind, allowing ample natural light and fresh air.
